description: Criminal Law and Procedure B examines the practical operation of the criminal law. The course explores two central concepts; discretion and fairness, to examine the processes involved from the pre-trial stage to sentencing and appeals.
restricted: LLB(Hons)(#64), LLB(Hons)(#48), LLB(Hons)#64 duals, LLB, LLB duals and LLB (Graduate Entry) programs.
